meaningMnemonic: Look at a <radical>building</radical> and <radical>compare</radical> the <radical>white</radical> parts. Each of those white parts is a <kanji>floor</kanji>. Multi-<kanji>story</kanji> buildings have tons of different floors that you can see from the outside.
readingMnemonic: One <kanji>floor</kanji> is just all <reading>kay</reading>aks (かい). You're looking at this building, and every other <kanji>story</kanji> is normal, but that one floor is kayak after kayak after kayak.
